The Vickie Dorsett Collection

An exploration of form, color, and texture through a modern lens.
css: .masonry-hero-gallery-section { font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; position: relative; width: 100%; height: 100vh; overflow: hidden; background-color: #111111; } .masonry-hero-gallery-container { width: 100%; height: 100%; } .masonry-hero-gallery-overlay { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); z-index: 2; display: flex; flex-direction: column; justify-content: center; align-items: center; text-align: center; color: #FFFFFF; padding: 20px; } .masonry-hero-gallery-overlay h1 { font-size: 2.5rem; margin: 0 0 1rem; font-weight: 700; } .masonry-hero-gallery-overlay p { font-size: 1.1rem; max-width: 600px; line-height: 1.5; } .masonry-hero-gallery-grid { display: grid; grid-template-columns: repeat(3, 1fr); grid-auto-rows: 250px; grid-gap: 10px; width: 100%; height: 100%; } .masonry-hero-gallery-item { overflow: hidden; } .masonry-hero-gallery-item:nth-child(2) { grid-row: span 2; } .masonry-hero-gallery-item:nth-child(4) { grid-column: span 2; grid-row: span 1; } .masonry-hero-gallery-item:nth-child(5) { grid-row: span 2; } .masonry-hero-gallery-item img { width: 100%; height: 100%; object-fit: cover; transition: transform 0.4s ease; } .masonry-hero-gallery-item:hover img { transform: scale(1.05); } @media (max-width: 1024px) { .masonry-hero-gallery-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr); grid-auto-rows: 200px; } .masonry-hero-gallery-overlay h1 { font-size: 2rem; } } @media (max-width: 768px) { .masonry-hero-gallery-grid { grid-template-columns: repeat(1, 1fr); grid-auto-rows: 250px; } .masonry-hero-gallery-item:nth-child(n) { grid-column: auto; grid-row: auto; } .masonry-hero-gallery-overlay h1 { font-size: 1.8rem; } .masonry-hero-gallery-overlay p { font-size: 1rem; } }
js: window.addEventListener('load', () => { document.querySelectorAll('img[src^="https://pixabay.com/api/"]').forEach(img => { fetch(img.src).then(response => response.json()).then(data => { if (data.hits && data.hits.length > 0) { img.src = data.hits[0].largeImageURL; } else { img.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/1280x720?text=Image+Not+Found'; } }).catch(error => { console.error('Error fetching Pixabay image:', error); img.src = 'https://via.placeholder.com/1280x720?text=Image+Not+Found'; }); }); });
